website_summaries.verdict: A super soft towel for detailing delicate surfaces.
pros: High-grade premium fabric is designed to buff away polishes, clear car wax, and remove swirls with ease
Very soft and comfortable to use
Measures 8x10 inches for easy use in heavily-contoured areas like mirrors, bumpers, and side skirts
cons: Somewhat expensive for a single towel

customer_reviews.title: Go to your nearest outlet store and buy one five times as big
customer_reviews.text: Buyers beware total rip-off for costs. I thought I was getting a towel it's basically a small rag. My bad I took it for granted.
customer_reviews.author: timothy Eddolls

customer_reviews.title: Best microfiber towel ever used!!!
customer_reviews.text: Was not sure whether it will due the job as described! To be honest I was amazed with the comfort. I used one for my clay bar application, and another one for my waxing. It highly absorbing and results are satisfying. I hand washed it after use and did not use dryer. Let it die self dry. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Busybeeerc

customer_reviews.title: The softest and most plush microfiber towels money can buy.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been detailing my cars for over 20 years and have tried every imaginable microfiber towel. My favorites used to be AutoSpa products but these Adams towels are the bees knees. They’re a bright white so any discoloration shows, giving you a clear indication of how soiled they are. They’re super plush and soft. Nothing else is allowed to touch my Italian exotic and German sleds. They are darn expensive but nearly worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: big_art

customer_reviews.title: Very Soft
customer_reviews.text: This microfiber towel is much softer than others I have used in the past. I think that this will do a great job at buffing wax residue off from a car, but the jury is still out on how absorbent it will be. I will still use a chamois for drying the car, but this towel will come in handy when hand waxing.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Perfect with the detail spray
customer_reviews.text: Perfect towel, I have bought 2 of these. Key is don't use them for anything but wiping your car down so they stay clean without any dust or grease on it. It's a bit pricey though buts it very nice towel and works perfect with their detail spray. I highly recommend both,
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cantwell

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market according to 65 yrs of experience
customer_reviews.text: My dad says these are the best towels on the market and he’s been detailing cars for 65 years. So, I bought one for him for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Chad R. Schuitema

customer_reviews.title: Great towel
customer_reviews.text: Great towel i use it when im detailing cars and this is one of my favorite towels in my arsenal
customer_reviews.author: Joe Whetstone

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Wipe and Shine
customer_reviews.text: Does an excellent job removing and polishing the finish without getting gummy.
customer_reviews.author: Steve in Cardiff

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction quality
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like the microfiber material that this towel is made from. However, the silk banded edge is already coming apart and its only been through the wash once.
customer_reviews.author: Tooth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice, and does a great on finish but doesn't scratch

customer_reviews.text: Great towel... One cloth dried entire car( Corvette C7) plus windows. No streaking and no problems

customer_reviews.text: So soft makes you want to rub in naughty areas........
